name: Knowledge of Business risk management at level 7
description: Knowledge of the planning and implementation of organisation-wide processes and procedures for the management of risk to the success or integrity of the business, especially those arising from the use of information technology, reduction or non-availability of energy supply or inappropriate disposal of materials, hardware or data.

issuer.name: Institute of Coding
issuer.description: Our mission is to break down barriers to digital learning and employment. We believe learning should be a lifelong process and that everyone has a right to improve their skills. We want to spread opportunity by offering access to education, providing what you need, when you need it, in a place you can reach.

criteria.narrative: The holder has demonstrated that they can explain and discuss the knowledge relevant to the following SFIA description: Establishes strategy for addressing risks arising from business operations and change. Provides resources to implement the strategy, and delegates authority for detailed planning and execution of risk management activities.
